YearlyReportSituationDescription: This is the situation of your organization for the current year. You can see the number of clients, transactions, income and expenses.
DECLARATIE_UNICA_CHECK1: 1. Professional interest, including between home/household and place(s) of professional activity and back.
DECLARATIE_UNICA_CHECK2: 2. Providing goods that cover the basic needs of people and pets/domestic animals.
DECLARATIE_UNICA_CHECK3: 3. Healthcare that cannot be delayed or delivered remotely.
DECLARATIE_UNICA_CHECK4: 4. Justified reasons, such as caring for/accompanying a minor/child, assisting the elderly, sick or disabled or death of a family member.
DECLARATIE_UNICA_CHECK5: 5. Individual physical activity (excluding any team/collective sports activities) or for the needs of pets/domestic animals, close to home.
DECLARATIE_UNICA_CHECK7: 7. Blood donation at blood transfusion centers.
DECLARATIE_UNICA_CHECK9: 9. Commercialization of agri-food products (in the case of agricultural producers).
DECLARATIE_UNICA_CHECK10: 10. The provision of goods necessary for carrying out the professional activity.
SendEmailDescription: Fill up the details in the form to send an email to the selected client. Click submit when you're done.
PostEmailError: There was an error while trying to send the email.
Subject: Subject
AddDocumentsDescription: Upload or drag and drop the file you want to upload.
DECLARATIE_UNICA_DESCRIPTION: Single declaration (212) - regarding income tax and social contributions owed by natural persons
DeleteDocumentConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this document? You cannot recover a deleted document.
BouncesTooltip: The email could not be delivered to the recipient due to any type of issue (generic term for bounced emails).
HardBouncesTooltip: The email could not be delivered due to a permanent issue (e.g., the email address is invalid, the domain does not exist).
SoftBouncesTooltip: The email could not be delivered due to a temporary issue (e.g., the recipient's mailbox is full, the server is down).
DeliveredTooltip: The email was successfully delivered to the recipient's email server.
SpamTooltip: The email was marked as spam by the recipient or their email provider.
RequestsTooltip: The number of email send requests made to Brevo.
ClicksTooltip: The recipient clicked on a link in the email.
InvalidTooltip: The email address is considered invalid or not properly formatted.
DeferredTooltip: The email delivery was delayed by the recipient's email server but may be attempted again.
BlockedTooltip: The email was blocked from being delivered, possibly due to spam filters or blacklisting.
UnsubscribedTooltip: The recipient has opted out or unsubscribed from further emails.
ErrorTooltip: There was a technical error when attempting to send the email.
LoadedByProxyTooltip: The email was opened or tracked through a proxy server (sometimes this happens with privacy settings enabled)
